title: Mabel and Fatty Viewing the World's Fair at San Francisco

sources.title: Mabel and Fatty Viewing the World's Fair
sources.description: Silent comedy legends Roscoe "Fatty" Arbuckle and Mabel Normand at the 1915 San Francisco World's Fair Panama-Pacific Exposition. The theme of the expo was the newly built Panama Canal, and it also focused on San Francisco's newly rebuilt infrastructure following the earthquake of 1906. IMDb entry: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0005675/

sources.title: MABEL AND FATTY VIEWING THE WORLD'S FAIR AT SAN FRANCISCO (1915)
sources.description: MABEL AND FATTY VIEWING THE WORLD'S FAIR AT SAN FRANCISCO (1915) Keystone-Mutual (The Frisco Story) 1 reel, rel. Apr. 22,1915 dir. Roscoe Arbuckle cast: Roscoe Arbuckle, Mabel Normand, with appearances by Mdme. Shuman-Heink and Mayor James Rolph finished: 4/16/1915 Location: San Francisco, CA copyright: Apr. 22, 1915 William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

sources.title: Mabel and Fatty Viewing the World's Fair at San Francisco

metadata.Plot: Frequent comedy co-stars Fatty Arbuckle and Mabel Normand take viewers on a tour of the 1915 Panama-Pacific Exposition in San Francisco. Attractions shown include the U.S. Battleship "Oregon", the Australian convict ship "Success" (complete with such punishment devices as a flogging rack and a spiked Iron Maiden), the world's tallest flagpole (251 feet), the Court of Abundance, the Court of the Universe (with sunken garden) and the Tower of Jewels. Fatty and Mabel also visit Frisco's still-under-construction City Hall, accompanied by Frisco's then-Mayor James Rolph Jr. Also appearing in the film is opera star Ernestine Schumann-Heink.
metadata.Actors: Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Mabel Normand, James Rolph Jr.

relatedMovies.title: Fatty and Mabel at the San Diego Exposition
